languages.text: {n}Реликварий варварски разломан, а ложе, на котором покоилась реликвия из святого праха прошлых Вольных Торговцев и их слуг, опустело.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Реликварий варварски разломан, а ложе, на котором покоилась реликвия из святого праха прошлых Вольных Торговцев и их слуг, опустело.{/n}

languages.text: {n}The reliquary has been brutally smashed, and the bed on which the sacred ashes of past Rogue Traders and their servants once rested is now empty.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Das Reliquiar wurde brutal zerschmettert, und das Bett, auf dem die heilige Asche frühere Freihändler und ihre Diener ruhte, ist nun leer.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The reliquary has been brutally smashed, and the bed on which the sacred ashes of past Rogue Traders and their servants once rested is now empty.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Das Reliquiar wurde brutal zerschmettert, und das Bett, auf dem frühere Freihändler und ihre Diener ruhten, ist nun leer.{/n}

languages.text: {n}El relicario ha sido destrozado brutalmente, y el lecho donde otrora reposaban las cenizas sagradas de anteriores Comerciantes Independientes y sus siervos está ahora vacío.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The reliquary has been brutally smashed, and the bed on which the sacred ashes of past Rogue Traders and their servants once rested is now empty.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El relicario ha sido destrozado brutalmente, y el lecho donde otrora reposaban los restos de anteriores Comerciantes Independientes y sus siervos está ahora vacío.{/n}

languages.text: {n}聖骨箱は無残に壊されて、歴代の自由開拓者とその従者達の聖なる灰が安置されていた台は空っぽになっている。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The reliquary has been brutally smashed, and the bed on which the sacred ashes of past Rogue Traders and their servants once rested is now empty.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}聖骨箱は無残に壊されて、歴代の自由開拓者とその従者達の遺骨が安置されていた台は空っぽになっている。{/n}

languages.text: {n}圣骨匣被野蛮地砸碎了。原本列位行商浪人与仆人骨灰的安息之地，如今已变得空空如也。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The reliquary has been brutally smashed, and the bed on which the sacred ashes of past Rogue Traders and their servants once rested is now empty.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}圣骨匣被野蛮地砸碎了。原本列位行商浪人与仆人的安息之地，如今已变得空空如也。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Le reliquaire a été fracassé, et la couche sur laquelle reposaient les cendres sacrées des libres-marchands des temps passés et de leurs serviteurs est entièrement vide.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The reliquary has been brutally smashed, and the bed on which the sacred ashes of past Rogue Traders and their servants once rested is now empty.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Le reliquaire a été fracassé, et la couche sur laquelle reposaient les corps des libres-marchands des temps passés et de leurs serviteurs est entièrement vide.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Kutsal emanet odası vahşice dağıtılmış ve geçmiş Hür Tacirlerin ve hizmetkârlarının kutsal küllerinin yer aldığı kaide artık boş.{/n}
